import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import "../Style/Home.scss"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default () => { const navRef = useRef(), aboutRef = useRef(), workRef = useRef(), contactRef = useRef(); const [backgroundColor, setBackgroundColor] = useState("#f7f3f0"); const [navPosition, setNavPosition] = useState(0); const [navUnderline, setNavUnderline] = useState({ about: "", work: "", contact: "", }); const [renderAni, setRenderAni] = useState(""); // const [ contactAni, setContactAni ] = useState(''); // const [ mousePosition, setMousePosition ] = useState({ // x: 0, y:0 // }) const [workActive, setWorkActive] = useState({ NetflixClone: "", ReactSomething: "", JavascriptProject: "", ViolinStore: "", }); //first render animation useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setRenderAni("--active"); }, 310); }, []); const handleNav = (() => { useEffect(() => { const underlineNav = () => { let offsetTop = { current: window.pageYOffset, nav: navRef.current.offsetTop, about: aboutRef.current.offsetTop, work: workRef.current.offsetTop, contact: contactRef.current.offsetTop, }; if (offsetTop.current > offsetTop.contact * 0.8) { setNavUnderline({ about: "", work: "", contact: "--active", }); } else if (offsetTop.current > offsetTop.work * 0.8) { setNavUnderline({ about: "", work: "--active", contact: "", }); } else if (offsetTop.current > offsetTop.about) { setNavUnderline({ about: "--active", work: "", contact: "", }); } }; window.addEventListener("scroll", underlineNav); return () => { window.removeEventListener("scroll", underlineNav); }; }, []); })(); return (
Front-end
Developer
  • window.scrollTo({ left: 0, top: aboutRef.current.offsetTop, behavior: "smooth", }) } > About
  • window.scrollTo({ left: 0, top: workRef.current.offsetTop, behavior: "smooth", }) } > Work
  • window.scrollTo({ left: 0, top: contactRef.current.offsetTop, behavior: "smooth", }) } > Contact
